DOC.brief_title: GIP Effects Insulin Induced Hypoglycemia Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Caucasians 18 year old Type 2 diabetes ( WHO criteria ) HbA1c > 9 % Liver disease ( ALAT/ASAT > 2 x upper normal limit ) Diabetic nephropathy ( screatinine > 130 ÂµM albuminuria ) Proliferative diabetic retinopathy ( anamnestic ) Severe arteriosclerosis heart failure ( NYHA group III og IV ) Anemia treatment medication applicable pause 12 hour Fasting plasma glucose > 15 mM screen day .
